properties.value: The willow blackjack is a melee weapon that has no level requirement to wield and is mainly used to knockout certain NPCs. A willow blackjack can be obtained by completing the blackjack section of the Rogue Trader miniquest or from Ali the Operator during The Feud quest. Item ID4600

The willow blackjack is a melee weapon that has no level requirement to wield and is mainly used to knockout certain NPCs. A willow blackjack can be obtained by completing the blackjack section of the Rogue Trader miniquest or from Ali the Operator during The Feud quest. Alternatively, it can be bought from the Blackjack seller in Pollnivneach directly behind Ali the Kebab seller or as a reward for The Feud quest. When fighting with a blackjack, there is a slight chance to stun the opponent.

There are three NPCs that can be knocked out: Villagers, bandits and Menaphite Thugs, all located in Pollnivneach. While there are no level requirement to knock out a villager, the Bandit requires 55 and the Menaphite Thug level 65 Thieving.

[[File:Willow blackjack detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''willow blackjack''' is a [[melee weapon]] that has no level requirement to wield and is mainly used to knockout certain [[NPCs]]. A willow blackjack can be obtained by completing the blackjack section of the [[Rogue Trader]] [[miniquest]] or from [[Ali the Operator]] during [[The Feud]] quest. Alternatively, it can be bought from the [[Blackjack seller]] in [[Pollnivneach]] directly behind [[Ali the Kebab seller]] or as a reward for [[The Feud]] quest. When fighting with a blackjack, there is a slight chance to [[Stun (status)|stun]] the opponent.

There are three NPCs that can be knocked out: [[Villager]]s, [[Bandit (Pollnivneach)|bandit]]s and [[Menaphite Thug]]s, all located in Pollnivneach. While there are no level requirement to knock out a villager, the Bandit requires 55 and the Menaphite Thug level 65 [[Thieving]].
